The mechanism clear , one possible explanation reduce absorption fat gut , due formation insoluble calcium fatty acid soap bind bile acid impairs formation micelle . The aim study examine high calcium intake dairy product , diet high normal fat content , effect fecal energy fat excretion , concentration substrate involve energy metabolism blood pressure .
